introPopup.title: Would you prefer us to do everything for you?

introPopup.btnSubmit: Call Me Back to activate bonuses

introSuccess.title: Congratulations!
introSuccess.text: Preferring to do everything yourself? It's convenient and fast. You choose the desired area of health support, and bonuses will be applied automatically.

problems.title: Choose the direction you are interested in:

categories.name: Joint care
list: Knees ache because of the weather
My back hurts and it's hard to move

categories.name: Pressure / Blood Vessels / Swelling
list: My legs are very swollen in the evening

categories.name: Slimness and metabolism
list: Weight stays the same or only increases over the years
My favorite clothes have become too tight
There is a heaviness in the body that was not there before

categories.name: Overall health improvement
list: I constantly worry about my health
I want to feel protected and active

joints.title: Joints and movement
joints.description: When your knees or back hurt more and more often, it's not just the joints themselves. The body often does not have enough resources to relieve stiffness. If you just wait, it won't get any easier; a comprehensive approach is needed.
benefitsList: first, the feeling of heaviness and "aching" is removed;
joints receive the necessary nutrition to move comfortably.
joints.recommendTitle: We have selected a set for you:

products.name: Steplex
products.description: helps relieve pain and make it easier for joints to move.

products.name: Cardiform
products.description: removes the feeling of heaviness and improves blood circulation.

products.name: Guavital+
products.description: helps reduce the impact of excess weight on joints.

products.name: Ultraxal
products.description: improves the functioning of the stomach, so that everything healthy is better absorbed.

diabetes.title: Sugar Balance Kit
diabetes.description: Constant cravings for sweets are a signal that the body is having difficulty maintaining energy balance. Sudden spikes in sugar are debilitating, so it's important to act gently and stress-free.
diabetes.benefitsTitle: What you will achieve in the course:
benefitsList: glucose levels stabilize (you no longer feel "sleepy" after eating);
the obsessive desire to eat something sweet disappears;
strength appears, and the overall state of health becomes even and stable.
diabetes.recommendTitle: We have selected a set for you:

products.name: Dialos
products.description: helps keep sugar normal.

products.name: Inspicure
products.description: helps you feel stable and energetic.

products.name: Guavital+
products.description: helps reduce the desire to constantly eat something.

products.name: Ultraxal
products.description: takes care of the digestive system and lightness.

bloodPressure.title: Pressure and Blood Vessels Kit
bloodPressure.description: If your blood pressure is unstable and your legs are swollen, this is a sign that your blood vessels have lost their elasticity and your heart is having a hard time working. Do not ignore these signals.
bloodPressure.benefitsTitle: How the body returns to normal:
benefitsList: first, excess water comes out (swelling and feeling of heaviness in the legs disappear);
the walls of blood vessels are strengthened so that they respond better to weather changes;
the pressure stabilizes, and the head becomes clear and "light".
bloodPressure.recommendTitle: We have selected a set for you:

products.name: Tonerin
products.description: helps keep blood pressure under control.

products.name: Kardivix
products.description: helps improve blood circulation and purify blood vessels.

products.name: Guavital+
products.description: removes excess salt and improves metabolism.

products.name: Ultraxal
products.description: helps remove swelling and excess water from the body.

weightLoss.title: Weight Control Kit
weightLoss.description: When weight “stagnates,” it’s a very common situation, especially with age. It is harder for the body to break down food than before. That is why it is important to choose the right course, and not expect a miracle in one day.
weightLoss.benefitsTitle: Usually the body acts step by step:
benefitsList: adjusts the metabolism so that the weight finally begins to melt away.
weightLoss.recommendTitle: We have selected a set for you:

products.name: Slimital
products.description: helps curb your appetite throughout the day.

products.name: Ozenmic Soft
products.description: helps the body break down food faster.

products.name: Vermixin
products.description: helps to cleanse the body of all excess.

products.name: Ultraxal
products.description: helps digestion work like clockwork.

tiredness.title: Fatigue Kit (Energy)
tiredness.description: Feeling "broken" in the morning often means that the body has accumulated too much excess and simply cannot cope with it. Regular coffee won't help here — you need to clean your system from the inside.
benefitsList: the body is gently cleansed of accumulated toxins;
the work of the stomach and intestines improves (heaviness disappears);
You start to get enough sleep and feel a surge of energy that you haven't had in a long time.
tiredness.recommendTitle: We have selected a set for you:

products.name: Guavital+
products.description: brings back energy and good mood.

products.name: Vermixin
products.description: helps cleanse the body of parasites and normalize the functioning of the gastrointestinal tract.

products.name: Ultraxal
products.description: helps digestion work smoothly.

products.name: Slimital
products.description: keeps you in shape and prevents you from gaining excess weight due to fatigue.

parasites.title: Overall health improvement
parasites.description: When all the body's systems begin to fail — vision, hearing, heart — the body simply needs a general reboot. It's like a major overhaul that's better done on time.
benefitsList: maintaining the heart and blood vessels in good condition;
improving digestion to keep the immune system strong;
protect your vision and hearing to make you feel confident and active.
